com.htsmart.wristband.dfu

Class DfuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.htsmart.wristband.dfu.DfuManager

  • public class DfuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Kilnn on 2017/6/7. Do Dfu Operation. Use checkUpdate() check and get a valid update info.

    And than get a DfuManager instance, call init() in Activity/Fragment onCreate() method.

    call release() ()} in Activity/Fragment onDestroy() method.

    call setDfuCallback(DfuCallback) monitor the dfu status and progress or an error.

    call start(String) start update.If your pass a url with this method, may be you app need network permission for download.
